about_the_game:
Confection Combat is a PvE sugar-based Shooter. Team up with your friends to fight armies of confection-based bad guys. 

-Silly Weapons: Choose from a variety of candy-based weapons including the Gummy Bear gun, Smore Launcher, Cane gun, Cane Cannon, Candy Corn Launcher and guided candy corn launcher. 

-Ridiculous enemies: Fight Gingerbread men, chocolate spiders, marshmallows and tanks made of graham crackers.

-Play online with up to 5 of your friends or play on your Local Area network (LAN). Need practice? Play a single player game and see how high of a score you can get.

-Explore 4 different battlefields each with its own unique features and challenges.

-NPCs too easy? Try playing Sugar Crash mode where the enemies, annoyed with your presence turn on you.

-No DLC packs and no paywalls, buy the game once and you have access to everything.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 / AMD HD 7870 / Intel Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection only required for online play
